sqlMap.select: select distinct store_name from storeinfo, memberinfo where store_owner = #member_id#
select store_product from storeInfo where store_name = #store_name#
select item_name from iteminfo where item_no = #item_no#
select store_no from storeinfo where store_name=#store_name#
sqlMap.insert: insert into orderinfo(order_no, store_no, item_no, order_amount) values(orderinfo_seq.nextval, #store_no#, #item_no#, #order_amount#)
